name: amasty/module-elastic-search-subscription-package-pro
description: Elastic Search Subscription Package Pro by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-xsearch-hyva-compatibility: Install this package to insure Autocomplite popup works with Hyvä Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-elastic-search-hyva-compat: Install this package to insure Elastic Search works with Hyvä Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-search-rate-limiter: Install this package in order to use the DDos guard functionality
suggest.amasty/module-elastic-search-pro-functio: Install this package for Standard tokenizer compatibility.
suggest.amasty/module-advanced-search-subscripti: Install this package in order to use the Date filter functionality for the Most Wanted Search Terms.
suggest.amasty/module-advanced-search-multi-stor: Install this package for Multi-Store Search compatibility.
